title: [The tua mariit wemen and the wedo. And other poems]
author: Dunbar, William, 1460?-1520?
publisher: Printer of the tua mariit wemen,
notes: Title, suggested imprint and suggested publication date from STC.
Leaf a3 begins: He wil my corse all beclip et clap to his breist.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
